name: Witchy Mystery
description:
This is the final portfolio project created during the Mastered Bootcamp. It was built in Unreal, using both C++ and Blueprints, and expanded on the Third Person Template.

Design
When designing this project I had complete creative freedom so I decided to take inspiration from games that I had played and enjoyed previously. 

Further Improvements
Due to time constraints, it was necessary to significantly reduce the scope of the project. However, I plan to continue the development of the game in order for it to match the initial design.
